Name: Joost
Review Text:
Nice little neighborhood bar with a good beer selection. Couple of good whiskies to be had.
Good service and nice customers.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Such a great place with the friendliest bartender. I‚Äôm so happy we dropped by this place. Great beers (only local breweries, thumbs up) and awesome combinations of gin tonics. Indie, folk and rock and a friendly atmosphere, combined with the drinks makes this an easy full rating!

Name: Joost
Review Text: nice place with always a friendly bar tender that chats with you.. terrace is heated. fresh dutch newspapers

Name: Joost
Review Text: Always good vibes when you enter, lovely personnel & good beer.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Joost should have 6 stars, it is that good. Local beers, often brewed with a few miles of the bar. Great selection, that changes a lot and most certainly with the seasons. Knowledgeable, friendly and humorous crew. Great places to sit outside and enjoy busy Amsterdam oost. It's a small place, so it gets crowded easy.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Cosy bar on a corner in Amsterdam Oost. Worth the visit..

Name: Joost
Review Text: Small place that gets crowded easily. Focused on specialised beers, most of them quite strong in taste. Serves a great gin-tonic, with a very decent price. But get some food nearby before you start drinking, they don't serve food and what they serve is all quite strong.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Small local pub in a great area of Amsterdam. The owner/barman was very friendly and welcoming, letting us sample a few of the beers before buying which I always like. Good music and great beer at good price. Can't wait to go back next time we're in the Dam.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Good, lively environment. Value for money on drinks. Tables outside for those who want to experience the Amsterdam weather. There are a couple of good places all around, allowing you to rest after some shopping.

Name: Joost
Review Text: A nice cozy Amsterdam bar.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Warm place, nice local biers, very kind bartenders, good music and board games

Name: Joost
Review Text: Favorite neighborhood bar, decent music. Crowded on weekends, but perfect week day after work local spot. Lot's of local craft beers! They do G&Ts but have little selection for cocktails, but it isn't a cocktail place.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Always great service, great vibes and great beers! 100% recommend

Name: Joost
Review Text: Best bar in Amsterdam. Period.

Name: Joost
Review Text: The best bar of Oost, maybe even In A‚Äôdam. Great selection of local beers. Very good atmosphere, like a second living room. Highly recommended!

Name: Joost
Review Text: Very nice laid back bar with excellent local beer selection. Never too crowded, always good service and good fun. I love the mixed crowd it attracts.

Name: Joost
Review Text: The best of everything. #1 people #2 beer

Name: Joost
Review Text: Just take a look at the beer list on the wall, it's nothing to sneeze at. Actually among the best in town, and I'm including the heavy hitters here. Vibe is 10/10, rustig in the week and Sunday mornings, or lekker bezig on Saturdays. ‚Ä¶

Name: Joost
Review Text: Thanks for the good beers and the lovely service.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Nice local pub with local people and expats. Especially nice when jaoie is working! Enjoy, its a little gem with the right people working on the right spot

Name: Joost
Review Text: Bloody fantastic little bar specialising in a glorious array of local beers, and impressive selection of ciders. The atmosphere is so enticing, you‚Äôll be hard pushed to leave.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Fantastic neighbourhood bar where everyone is welcome. Good selection of beers, delicious snacks and great service.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Lovely terrace and good service

Name: Joost
Review Text: Really nice atmosphere, good selection of drinks and great price. Perfect place for a drink and a chat

Name: Joost
Review Text:
Great Bar, a bit Pricey but they have A LOT of nice craft beer.
Would recommend

Name: Joost
Review Text: Local craft beer bar with a lovely easy atmosphere. Enjoy Amsterdam-based craft beers while playing some bar games.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Cosy neighborhood bar with exclusively Amsterdam craft beer offering. Nice vibe and personnel.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Lovely local bar, specialized in local craft beers. Good beers, good staff, super atmosphere

Name: Joost
Review Text: Perfect atmosphere and service. Lovely guys. Nice bar for either just a beer, coffee or a great night out

Name: Joost
Review Text: Small bar with friendly staff, nice music and great variety of beers. What else do you need?

Name: Joost
Review Text: One of my favorite neighborhood bars. Serves beers from local Amsterdam breweries (almost exclusively). Good music too!

Name: Joost
Review Text: Always a great bar in which you'll find the drink that you want, as long as its Dutch, which they have covered, plus, get real friendly service from the bar.

Name: Joost
Review Text:
Best bar for people from the neighbourhood. They only Amsterdam brewed beers.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Great bar, good beer

Name: Joost
Review Text: Great bar. I had a great time and I believe one of my best friends just met her future husband there tonight.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Nice cosy bar, a lot of locals here. The atmosphere is nice, but the place is small so expect not to find places to sit.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Best bar in the east part of town. Great local beers and great service. My favorite hangout.

Name: Joost
Review Text: Lots of special beers, friendly crew, good snacks and full with locals. Go have a local beer here!
